sections.content:
Question:
Does compatibility with LPDDR4 mean that DDR4 is also supported? Also, is there any documentation on PCB design for LPDDR4?
Answer:
No, DDR4 is not supported.
For information on PCB design, refer to the available PCB Design Guide for LPDDR4 (R01AN7268EJ0100) and PCB Verification Guide for LPDDR4 (R01AN7260EJ0100).
Suitable Products
RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H
